comment: While Professor Vann is a nice person and a good teacher, my only downfall was that I had no interest in the class and found the lectures boring. His tests are hard as are the lab assignments. Pay attention in class and study, study, study.

Not only is Professor Vann a great teacher, he is also a great person. He shows a lot of interest in what he teaches. He is the most helpful teacher I've ever had in my 4 years as a student. If you are on a track to complete your Geography or GIS major, I strongly recommend taking Dr. Vann. You will regret it if you take someone else.
I liked him. I found the material interesting in general. He gives extra credit if you attend lectures - so make sure you attend.

this guy is very nice. his class is easy, the only difficult part are the quizzes which aren't that bad because they are from the book which you can use. and his tests are directly from the quizzes. Very nice guy easy class i'd take him again.
